author: der
msg: Patched problem from Harry Wagner in march - a dropped connection
is treated as an unformatted database and an unfromated database triggers
a reformat deleting all data. Patched around both stages in this chain.

author: der
msg: Add rethrow of SQLExceptions to enable programmatic detection and recovery from problems

author: der
msg: Made consGraph protected to provide a subclass extension point

author: chris-dollin
msg: Mentioned database prefix fix & start/finish read events.

author: chris-dollin
msg: BaseExampleExpression was no longer used( or useful), so it has been
deleted. The expression-creating code from ExampleCreate has been moved
into QueryTestBase (and merges with the utility methods there); that
left ExampleCreate empty, so *that* has been deleted.
By having TestEarlyConstraints subclass QueryTestBase, duplicate code
can be (and has been) removed from it (TEC).
